Could someone please tell me what lol means? Or OCC for that matter?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: lol, the nbwrpg site was down (stopping me from checking 
> on all of the bots in the faction as of yet) while I was giving out 
> initial orders with Pacifix, and I forgot that Dion was with the 
group 
> =P lol
> 
> --- Pacifix / Swoop / Crossroads ---
> 
> Pacifix nods to Dion, "That would be fine." He turns to the 
> Dinobots, and all the other bots present then adds a little onto 
his 
> previous orders, "Autobots, there are some Decepticons outside, 
> we need to take care of them. That will be the first task, before 
> your first orders take effect." He tones his voice down and speaks 
> to Crotale, "Crotale, lets go and clear the Decepticon presence." 
> He hops down from the box he was standing on, and heads 
> towards the ship's exit. 
> 
> Crossroads looks at Grimlock again, and says, in a slightly 
> nervous voice, "Uhh, come'on we don't wanna miss any action!" He 
> starts heading to the exit, but waits for Grimlock.
> 
> Swoop grins at the though of action, "Me Swoop love to smash 
> decepticons. Grimlock ready?" He queries.
> 
> 
> On 20 Jul 2001, at 5:24, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> 
> > ::Dion/Scavenger/Autofire/Stratus::
> > 
> > Dion's comm-link gets JetV's transmission as well, the bot 
frowning
> > and walking over to Pacifix.
> > 
> > "Want me to go help JetV? I'd rather be handling a 'situation' 
than
> > checking on how many walls got banged in."
